Articles.Content:
Hi all! Huge greetings from Bournemouth on the sunny south coast of the UK!

I fell into Kerbal after browsing a list of sim games a few months ago, and with a lot of practice and a huge amount of help from the fantastic Scott Manley vids, I'm now a fairly seasoned Kerbonaut! A computer failure resulted in my save being wiped, so have just started afresh which is actually quite nice as it tests you again without all the add on extras!

Love the game, look forward to hearing from you all!

Edited December 4, 2014 by Master Tao
commerical content removed
I too have experienced wipes. It sucks. But starting over is fun also. Its a tradeoff. Welcome to the forums.
